data.eml:eml: A nine-family classification of caecilians (Amphibia: Gymnophiona)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilkinson, Mark, Mauro, Diego San, Sherratt, Emma, Gower, David J. (2011): A nine-family classification of caecilians (Amphibia: Gymnophiona). Zootaxa 2874: 41-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200863
